Question
========
  
A researcher wants to know whether there is a relationship between smoking (0=not; 1=sometimes; 2=often) and exercise (0=not; 1=well). In doing so, he wants to statistically control for weight (in kg) and education (number of years). Which method is most appropriate to examine this? 
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple linear regression
* Multiple logistic regression
* ANCOVA
* Chi-square test for independence


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
